definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
lit. to prescribe moxibustion for oneself when not ill; to cause oneself trouble with superfluous action
see 砭灸術|砭灸术[bian1 jiu3 shu4]

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the curative effect of a moxibustion ball on cough of yin-deficiency and fire-excess type.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察灸疗球治疗阴虚火旺型咳嗽的疗效。

sentences.english: A moxa cone placed directly on the point and ignited is called direct moxibustion.
sentences.chinese: 是将艾炷直接放在穴位皮肤上施灸的一种方法。

sentences.english: If Shenshu can be applied to blister or scar moxibustion moxibustion has better curative effect.
sentences.chinese: 若肾俞能施发疱灸或瘢痕灸，则疗效更好。

sentences.english: If Shenshu can be applied to blister or scar moxibustion moxibustion has better curative effect.
sentences.chinese: 若肾俞能施发疱灸或瘢痕灸，则疗效更好。

sentences.english: Zhuang medicine medicated thread moxibustion is a commonly used external treatment in Zhinese Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 壮医药线点灸疗法是壮医常用的外治法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of Zhao's Thunder-Fire moxibustion therapy on allergic rhinitis(AR).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察传统的赵氏雷火灸治疗变应性鼻炎的疗效。

sentences.english: Walking in the burning sunshine makes people wearisome.
sentences.chinese: 在灸热的阳光下行走让人感到疲倦。

sentences.english: Master the all kinds of techniques of moxa-roll moxibustion.
sentences.chinese: 掌握各种艾卷灸的操作。

sentences.english: How many moxibustion therapies can be used to cure diseases with "fire"?
sentences.chinese: 用于“火”来灸疗治病的灸法有多少种？

definition: to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)
cupping glass/fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
see 砭灸術|砭灸术[bian1 jiu3 shu4]
to smear/to apply glue or ointment to a surface
acupuncture and moxibustion/to give or have acupuncture and moxibustion
